name: LifeMoves Opportunity Services Center
description: Emergency interim shelter, food, clothing, and intensive case management for families in crisis; includes specialized veteran support programs
fullDescription: LifeMoves provides comprehensive services to help individuals and families experiencing homelessness transition to stable housing through shelter, case management, and supportive programs.
whatTheyOffer:
- Emergency interim shelter
- Food and meal services
- Clothing assistance
- Intensive case management
- Employment assistance
- Specialized veteran support programs
howToGetIt:
1. Call LifeMoves hotline
2. Complete intake assessment
3. Meet with case manager
4. Develop housing stability plan
5. Access shelter and services
6. Work toward permanent housing
keywords: LifeMoves, homeless services, shelter, case management, food, clothing, veteran services, housing assistance
